facials.title: Facial Treatments
facials.info:
Basic

Our basic include steam treatment, cleansing and exfoliation, a hydrating treatment with a facial mask.

LED Photo Facial

This treatment uses narrow spectrum light to boost collagen, which creates plumper, younger-looking skin, or to kill the bacteria that causes acne.

SilkPeel

This treatment is design to improve the appearance of skin with just one or a series of treatments

Acne

This treatment utilizes lotions with alpha-hydroxy acids, urea peroxide, and salicylic acid for cleansing skin of whiteheads and blackheads

Anti-Aging

This treatment use products and technigques designed to slow the aging process, brighten skin, and reduce wrinkles.

Pigmentation/Rosaceca

This treatment comfortably fades the appearance of skin imperfections caused by the sun and uneven skin tones.
